boardgame.name: En Garde
アン・ギャルド
boardgame.description: Experience the thrill of fencing_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; board game style! In this two-player game, tactics, skill, and a little bit of luck will determine the best fencer. Teach yourselves the concepts with the basic game, test yourselves with the standard game, and challenge yourselves with the advanced game. Cards fly back and forth as the fencers attack, and parry-riposte._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Who will be bold enough to attack first? Is it possible to win with that initial attack or has your opponent beguiled you into an attack while waiting to mount a parry-riposte?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;En Garde is a very dynamic game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; strategically rich yet easy to learn and play. Three levels of rules are included in the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-Imagined as:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Flash Duel: Second Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Game is complete, but the box has a bit of wear. The cards are in great condition, very little wear. The cards which form the board were formally taped together with _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;invisible_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; tape_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, and there is still some tape remaining on them--not very bothersome. In fact, if I were going to play again, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;d tape them together again, since it was so much more convenient.
brand new, still in shrink!! Very hard to find Knizia game, an excellent game by the way!!

never played +++++ first german edition from abacus +++++ will be shipped with insurance only +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ payment for usa and canada : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for asia and australia: cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ countries, that have no euro : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich is cost-free !) +++++ payment for european countries, that have no euro : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped), pleask at for prices, befor you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros

Ferti Games - En Garde 3D Deluxe Edition Language: Dutch, French _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; German Players: 2 Age: 8+ Duration: about 30 min Weight: 0.990 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Experience the thrill of fencing— board game style! In this two-player game, tactics, skill, and a little bit of luck will determine the best fencer. Teach yourselves the concepts with the basic game, test yourselves with the standard game, and challenge yourselves with the advanced game. Cards fly back and forth as the fencers attack, and parry-riposte. Who will be bold enough to attack first? Is it possible to win with that initial attack or has your opponent beguiled you into an attack while waiting to mount a parry-riposte? En Garde is a very dynamic game— strategically rich yet easy to learn and play. Three levels of rules are included in the game. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Brand New in Shrink! A portion of the earnings from each sale are donated to St. Jude Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Research Hospital. Shipping to USA48: $7.95 I will combine shipping to save you money when ordering multiple games. Other shipping options are available upon request (Next Day / USPS / FEDEX). Contact for shipping quote. Alaska and Hawaii orders are shipped via USPS. International orders are shipped via USPS First Class (under 4 pounds) or USPS Priority Mail (up to 70 pounds per box). Contact for shipping quote. Orders ship within 1 business day from receipt of payment (5-10 day waiting period on personal checks). Ohio residents will be charged 6.5% sales tax. Thank-you, Mr. B ROCKIN’ B GAMES www.rockinbgames.com mrb.rockinbgames@gmail.com

Multilingual version I can send you pictures of the game if you wish. Local pickup available near Montreal (Longueuil). I also visit these cities in Quebec so we can agree for a meetup there : Chambly, Montreal, Beloeil, Saint-Hyacinthe, Saint-Hubert. Shipping time within Canada and the US Expect 2 to 7 days, depending on distance from Montreal, QC. If you are on the West Coast, expect about 7 days for the package to reach you. Shipping within Canada There is only one parcel category, and cost varies between $12 and $20 for 1 game, depending on area and weight. Add $3 to $5 for each additional game. Shipping to the US When shipping to the US from Canada, there are three parcel categories, those being small, medium and large. The cost is based on overall area (Length x Width x Height), which is then multiplied by weight. The Canada Post calculator can be found here: http://www.canadapost.ca/cpotools/apps/far/personal/farUS?ex... Shipping examples: Shipping a single game costs between $16 (Medici vs Strozzi) and $25 (standard FFG box size) for the first game, then add $3-5 dollars per game, depending on size _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; weight.

This is a combination of 2 different editions. I purchased the leather mat that came in the first german edition. Then I purchased the Abacus edition to get the 25 fencing cards and 4 dice (2 swordsman dice and 2 marker dice). I sleeved the 25 fencing cards. The rulebook is in 3 languages - english, german and french. The game has never been played because I had 5 editions of this game:) The Abacus box that the cards and dice are stored in shows definite wear - when I bought the game for the fencing cards the box showed definite wear, but the cards were sealed and the dice were new - those were the only components I cared about. Comes from a smoke-free home.
